CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Retention Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Retention Rate is Promotion Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Skill Proficiency Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Retention Rate is Job Satisfaction.

SRP.Q: On the Skill Proficiency Rate, is the point for Anderson, Evans and Moore inside or outside the point for Smith-Klein?
SRP.A: On the Skill Proficiency Rate, the point for Anderson, Evans and Moore is outside the point for Smith-Klein.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Skill Proficiency Rate} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Anderson, Evans and Moore?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Skill Proficiency Rate}, while the weakest aspect is{ Job Satisfaction}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Promotion Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Promotion Rate, label {Smith-Klein} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Skill Proficiency Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Skill Proficiency Rate, label {Smith-Klein} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of Smith-Klein on the Pay Equity Ratio in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Smith-Klein on the Safety dimension is {62}.

VE.Q: What is the value of Anderson, Evans and Moore on the Time-to-Fill Rate in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of Anderson, Evans and Moore on the Safety dimension is {50}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label Smith-Klein across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of Smith-Klein across all dimensions is {72}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label Smith-Klein across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of Smith-Klein across all dimensions is {50}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Time-to-Fill Rate
SC.A: The average value of Time-to-Fill Rate is {42.0}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Smith-Klein
SC.A: The average value of Smith-Klein is {54.57}.

NF.Q: Which labels have scores above 64 for the Job Satisfaction dimension? Please list the labels and corresponding scores.
For Anderson, Evans and Moore in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores between 43 and 81? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.
NF.A: {Time-to-Fill Rate} is {50}, {Retention Rate} is {53}, {Promotion Rate} is {59}, {Offer Acceptance Rate} is {68}

NF.Q: For Anderson, Evans and Moore in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores below 43? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.

NC.Q: For Anderson, Evans and Moore, which dimension has a higher score: Pay Equity Ratio or Job Satisfaction?
NC.A: {Pay Equity Ratio} has a higher score than Job Satisfaction for Anderson, Evans and Moore.

NC.Q: For Anderson, Evans and Moore, which dimension has a higher score: Retention Rate or Skill Proficiency Rate?
NC.A: {Skill Proficiency Rate} has a higher score than Retention Rate for Anderson, Evans and Moore.

NC.Q: On Time-to-Fill Rate, which label has a higher score: Smith-Klein or the Anderson, Evans and Moore?
NC.A: {Anderson, Evans and Moore} has a higher score on Time-to-Fill Rate compared to Smith-Klein.

NC.Q: For Anderson, Evans and Moore, which dimension has a higher score: Pay Equity Ratio or Job Satisfaction or Retention Rate?
NC.A: {Retention Rate} has a higher score for Anderson, Evans and Moore.

MSR.Q: For Anderson, Evans and Moore, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Anderson, Evans and Moore most needs to improve its {Job Satisfaction}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Anderson, Evans and Moore}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {Smith-Klein}.
